meanings.definition: Of, relating to, or characteristic of an obsession.
meanings.sent1: Her obsessional behavior towards cleanliness was evident in her daily routine.
meanings.sent2: He had an obsessional need to check the locks multiple times before leaving the house.
meanings.sent3: The obsessional way she arranged her bookshelf by color made her friends chuckle.
meanings.sent4: His obsessional focus on perfection turned his art into a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The obsessional nature of his thoughts about germs made him wash his hands constantly.

meanings.definition: A person who is obsessed with something.
meanings.sent1: She was an obsessional when it came to collecting vintage stamps.
meanings.sent2: The obsessional spent hours researching every detail about his favorite band.
meanings.sent3: The obsessional in the group always made sure everything was perfectly organized.
meanings.sent4: The obsessional's dedication to his hobby was truly admirable.
meanings.sent5: Being an obsessional about his work, he never missed a deadline.
